attributes.action: fireworks should be banned other than 5th November and new year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: fireworks should be banned other than around the 5th of november (eg a couple of days before and after) and new years  eve and divali because it frightens the elderly and our pets and wild animals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
